clinical_study.brief_title: A Single-dose Study to Investigate the Effects of 3 Different Doses of Inhaled AZD2115 in COPD Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo and Active Controlled, Multi-centre, 6 Way Cross-over, Single-dose Phase IIa Study to Investigate the Local and Systemic Effects of 3 Different Doses of Inhaled AZD2115 in Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)

brief_summary.textblock: This study in COPD patients will investigate the bronchodilatory effect of AZD2115. AZD2115 will be tested versus placebo and active comparators. The safety and tolerability of AZD2115 including investigations of clinically relevant systemically mediated effects will also be investigated.

detailed_description.textblock: A randomised, double-blind, placebo and active controlled, multi-centre, 6 way cross-over, single-dose Phase IIa study to investigate the local and systemic effects of 3 different doses of inhaled AZD2115 in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)

primary_outcome.measure: Peak Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) defined as the maximum FEV1 from the spirometry assessments
primary_outcome.time_frame: During the first 24 hours following administration

primary_outcome.measure: Trough FEV1defined as the average FEV1 from the spirometry assessments

secondary_outcome.measure: Peak, average and trough Forced Vital Capacity (FVC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: FVC peak and average 0-24h post-dose and trough 22-26h post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Systemic effect by assessment of blood pressure (BP)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Peak and average 0-4 h post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Systemic effect by assessment of heart rate (HR) and QT interval corrected for heart rate using Fridericia's formula (QTcF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Peak and average 0-4 h post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Systemic effect by assessment of Potassium and Glucose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Peak and average 0-4 h post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety and tolerability of 3 different single doses of AZD2115
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At screening, during 0-26 h post-dose and at follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma concentrations of AZD2115 after 3 different single doses measured as area under the curve over the time (AUC) and maximum concentration (Cmax), and time to maximum concentration (tmax)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Provision of informed consent prior to any study specific procedures
- Male or female of non-childbearing potential (post-menopausal or surgically sterilised), age ≥40 years at Visit 1
- Clinical diagnosis of COPD for more than 1 year at Visit 1, according to GOLD guidelines
- Post-bronchodilator FEV1 ≥ 40 to < 80% of the predicted normal value and post-bronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 70%
- Reversible airway obstruction
Exclusion Criteria:
- Significant disease or disorder which, in the opinion of the Investigator, may either put the patient at risk because of participation in the study, or influence the result of the study, or the patient's ability to participate in the study.
- An exacerbation of COPD within 6 weeks prior to Visit 1
- Treatment with systemic glucocorticosteroids with 6 weeks of Visit 2.
- Recent or ongoing respiratory tract infection during enrolment period.
- Need for long-term oxygen therapy and/or saturation O2 < 92%.
